ON_SIGN_IN_WELCOME.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:URL_ON_SIGN_IN_WELCOME_IMAGE]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Welcome to the new Plex-Earth Lite!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get the best view of your project area.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'>Click here to learn more</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_SIGN_IN_WELCOME.title: Welcome to the new Plex-Earth Lite!

ON_LITE_SWITCH_TO_PRO.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:URL_ON_SWITCH_TO_PRO_IMAGE]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Upgrade to Pro Now!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get the fully fledged Plex-Earth  view of your project area.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_PAGE_CONTACT_SUPPORT]'>Contact Support Team for more info</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_LITE_SWITCH_TO_PRO.title: Upgrade to Pro!

ON_COMMAND_DENY.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Upgrade to Plex-Earth Pro Now!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get the perfect view of your project area.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_PAGE_CONTACT_SUPPORT]'>Contact Support Team for more info</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_COMMAND_DENY.title: Unavailable Command!

ON_PRINT_DENY.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Plex-Earth elements won’t be printed.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Upgrade to Pro to print your drawing with all Plex-Earth terrain and imagery, and unlock advanced tools for data export and management.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='action:contactSupport'>Questions? Contact our Support Team</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_PRINT_DENY.title: Plex-Earth elements won’t be printed
